title: Texas Firm Recalls Beef Products Due To Possible E. Coli Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 4, 2014 PFP Enterprises, a Fort Worth, Texas, establishment, is recalling approximately 15,865 pounds of beef products because they may be contaminated with E. coli O103, E. coli O111, E. coli O121, E. coli O145, E. coli O26 and E. coli O45, the...
impacted_products: 10.5-lb. boxes of Beef Outside Skirt Steak, with a pack date of “12/13/13”
20-lb. boxes of Studio Movie Grill Beef Tenderloin Sliced, with a pack date of “12/05/13”
